summary: Completed frontend testing of UI Pack A for Mission Control Dashboard. Most features working correctly with one critical overlay issue preventing standup panel close functionality.

ui_bugs.issue: Dismiss and Close buttons not clickable due to overlay interception from Emergent badge (z-index: 9999)
ui_bugs.details: Fixed position Emergent badge at bottom-right intercepts pointer events, preventing users from closing the standup panel

ui_bugs.issue: ESC key does not close the standup panel
ui_bugs.details: Standard UX pattern missing - users expect ESC key to close modal/panel interfaces

passed_tests: Mission Banner visible above top bar with italic default text
Mission Banner has gradient background (cyan tint)
Mission Banner edit modal opens and functions correctly
Mission edit modal has textarea, Cancel and Save buttons working
Text editing and saving updates banner text correctly
Cancel functionality works without saving changes
Standup button visible in top bar with ClipboardList icon
Standup panel opens correctly with right slide-over
Standup panel shows all 5 sections with correct item counts (Completed: 2, In Progress: 3, Blocked: 2, Needs Review: 3, Key Decisions: 4)
Standup panel has 28px border-radius and backdrop blur
Demo Pulse toggle visible in Live Feed header with default OFF state
Demo Pulse toggle ON/OFF functionality works correctly
No regressions - existing features work (32 kanban cards, 10 agents, feed tabs, counts)
Layout positioning correct (top bar at 32px, body margin 96px)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical overlay issue: Emergent badge (z-index: 9999) prevents standup panel close buttons from being clickable. Reduce z-index or adjust positioning. Add ESC key handler for standup panel closure.
